description: Refer to separate submission 25/00869/LBC: method of demolition (3), site security (4), method statement (5), sample panels (6) and new stone finial (7) in respect of repairs and partial rebuilding of masonry gate pier and adjacent masonry to part of the western park entrance following vehicle impact.
